description: This file sets up a memory-based agent with associated storage, tools, and a playground interface for testing or interaction. It initializes components like memory, storage, and the agent itself, then creates a playground app and runs a server if executed as the main module.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: A class representing the interactive playground environment for the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing the AI agent with memory, tools, and configuration.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the web application instance for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the playground server with specified host, port, and reload options.
